# groupID

**Instance Property**

The audio unit channel that handles the event.

## Declaration

```swift
var groupID: UInt32 { get set }
```

## Discussion

The valid range of values are between `0` and `15`, but can be higher if the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVMusicTrack] destination audio unit supports more channels.

## Configuring a Note On Event

- **midiNote**: The MIDI note number.
- **velocity**: The MDI velocity.
- **instrumentID**: The instrument identifier.
- **duration**: The duration of the event, in beats.

items.description: The duration of the event, in beats.
